医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新方法使用肽来增强抗肿瘤药物配方一组科学家开发了一种突破性的方法，使用专门设计的肽来改进药物配方。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/New-approach-uses-peptides-to-enhance-anti-tumor-drug-formulations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/New-approach-uses-peptides-to-enhance-anti-tumor-drug-formulations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1789bbf3-802c-4450-9a5e-58d7249ac493 Fri, 24 Jan 2025 21:37:22 -0500 New approach uses peptides to enhance anti-tumor drug formulations
UH Seidman 癌症中心推出先进的 Varian Ethos 2.0 用于癌症治疗UH Seidman 癌症中心的放射肿瘤学家为诊断患有多种癌症的患者提供了另一种强大的治疗选择，即 Varian Ethos 2.0，能够进行一种称为适应性放射治疗的新型放射治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/UH-Seidman-Cancer-Center-introduces-advanced-Varian-Ethos-20-for-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/UH-Seidman-Cancer-Center-introduces-advanced-Varian-Ethos-20-for-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d79c772a-c210-453d-a196-3084b50f050f Fri, 24 Jan 2025 21:35:26 -0500 UH Seidman Cancer Center introduces advanced Varian Ethos 2.0 for cancer treatment
研究人员确定了 AML 患者成功输注供体淋巴细胞的关键因素丹娜—法伯癌症研究所的研究人员已经确定了决定供体淋巴细胞输注 (DLI) 是否能够成功使患者病情缓解的因素，DLI 是一种针对同种异体造血干细胞移植后复发的急性髓系白血病 (AML) 患者的标准疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Researchers-identify-key-factors-for-successful-donor-lymphocyte-infusion-in-AML-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Researchers-identify-key-factors-for-successful-donor-lymphocyte-infusion-in-AML-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11b2a248-b58a-4591-b258-203f7863ad5e Fri, 24 Jan 2025 21:06:52 -0500 Researchers identify key factors for successful donor lymphocyte infusion in AML patients
研究凸显了早期前列腺癌基因组测试的潜力莫菲特癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项新审查评估了三种基因组测试——Decipher、Oncotype DX 基因组前列腺评分 (GPS) 和 Prolaris——如何帮助医生就如何治疗早期前列腺癌患者做出更好的决定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Study-highlights-pottial-of-genomic-tests-for-early-stage-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Study-highlights-pottial-of-genomic-tests-for-early-stage-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce70a004-475b-4900-b0ec-8507e424199b Fri, 24 Jan 2025 21:01:05 -0500 Study highlights potential of genomic tests for early stage prostate cancer
在线应用程序通过蛋白质和纤维跟踪支持减肥许多人都在努力保持健康的体重，而选择最佳的减肥膳食可能具有挑战性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Online-app-supports-weight-loss-through- Protein-and-Fiber-tracking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Online-app-supports-weight-loss-through- Protein-and-Fiber-tracking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=315f576e-97ec-4827-8d64-88daac959a57 Fri, 24 Jan 2025 20:56:41 -0500 Online app supports weight loss through protein and fiber tracking
新的光技术可以改变心脏组织修复来自麻省布里格姆总医院和合作机构的研究人员开发了一种非侵入性方法，通过使用光刺激融入生物打印组织的创新墨水来操纵心脏组织活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/New-light-based-technique-could-transform-heart-tissue-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/New-light-based-technique-could-transform-heart-tissue-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec84c5a8-039a-4938-a4c6-1545617dcfe9 Fri, 24 Jan 2025 20:52:43 -0500 New light-based technique could transform heart tissue repair
长读长测序彻底改变了罕见疾病的诊断全球每 10 人中就有 1 人受到一种罕见遗传病的影响，但尽管遗传技术和检测迅速发展，但其中约 50% 的人仍未得到诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Long-read-sequencing-revolutionizes-diagnosis-of-rare-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Long-read-sequencing-revolutionizes-diagnosis-of-rare-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b7cd4d1-8ac9-492c-bae5-7c355e8e7c81 Fri, 24 Jan 2025 20:43:00 -0500 Long-read sequencing revolutionizes diagnosis of rare diseases
脑植入技术的进展与挑战维也纳医科大学斯坦尼萨·拉斯波波维奇（Stanisa Raspopovic）领导的科学团队最近在领先期刊《柳叶刀数字健康》上发表了一篇论文，研究了脑植入物研发的进展和挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Advances-and-challenges-in-brain-implant-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Advances-and-challenges-in-brain-implant-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=092d1932-12b3-46b0-ac6d-cbea5572930f Fri, 24 Jan 2025 20:39:26 -0500 Advances and challenges in brain implant technology
脑库组织样本揭示了中风引起的损伤和修复的关键发现圣地亚哥大学分子医学系研究人员的一项新研究揭示了中风最严重的后果之一：大脑“电缆”（即所谓的神经纤维）受损，从而导致永久性损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Brain-Bank-tissue-samples-unlock-key-findings-about-中风-induced-damage-and-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Brain-Bank-tissue-samples-unlock-key-findings-about-中风-induced-damage-and-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=353598cc-997a-4ebf-b050-68b19dc0dbe4 Fri, 24 Jan 2025 20:35:13 -0500 Brain Bank tissue samples unlock key findings about stroke-induced damage and repair
绘制人类病毒组图谱以改善疾病预防和治疗我的朋友，你就是科学家所说的“全生物”——一种由人类细胞和生活在你体内和身体上的多种微观物种组成的有机体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Mapping-the- human-virome-to-improve-disease-prevention-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Mapping-the- human-virome-to-improve-disease-prevention-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b3b85ce-0740-4f8c-9115-7730557b4bf9 Fri, 24 Jan 2025 20:30:33 -0500 Mapping the human virome to improve disease prevention and treatment
